text: Framed is a 1947 American crime movie directed by Richard Wallace and starring Glenn Ford, Janis Carter, Barry Sullivan, Edgar Buchanan, Karen Morley, Jim Bannon. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 crime movies Category:1940s American crime movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Wallace
title: Framed (1947 movie)
